mapper.sql: b.id AS board_id, b.title AS board_title, b.content AS board_content, e.id AS employee_id, e.name AS employee_name
mapper.select: SELECT FROM board b JOIN employee e ON b.employee_id = e.id WHERE b.id = #{id}
SELECT FROM board b JOIN employee e ON b.employee_id = e.id ORDER BY b.id DESC
SELECT FROM board b JOIN employee e ON b.employee_id = e.id WHERE b.employee_id = #{employeeId} ORDER BY b.id DESC
SELECT FROM board b JOIN employee e ON b.employee_id = e.id WHERE b.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') ORDER BY b.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, content, employee_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{employee.id})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE id = #{id}
